snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include efforts in Congress to make unlocking cellphones legal, a review of Ray Kurzweil’s latest book and Google...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Wednesday, selections include efforts in Congress to make unlocking cellphones legal, a review of Ray Kurzweil’s latest book and Google talking about secret requests by the F.B.I. for information.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Google and the F.B.I., and HTC Falters
